definitions.definition: a period of one hundred years.
examples: a century ago most people walked to work

definitions.definition: a period of one hundred years reckoned from the traditional date of the birth of Jesus Christ.
a company in the ancient Roman army, originally of one hundred men.
an ancient Roman political division for voting.
a bicycle race of one hundred miles.
examples: the nation's largest single-day century ride

definitions.definition: a score of one hundred in a sporting event, such as a cricket match.
